# Test Document: Format V1 (Simple)

This is the original format used by the first sample document (Pelican Bay).

## Body Text

Heart failure affects millions worldwide[1]. Recent studies show promising treatments[2][3].
The combination therapy approach[1,2] has shown significant benefits.

Multiple citations in ranges like [1-3] should also work.

## References

1. [Heart Failure Management - NEJM](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32871762/)
2. [Cardiac Rehabilitation Guidelines - AHA](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31082266/)
3. [Novel Therapeutics in Heart Disease - Nature](https://doi.org/10.1038/s41569-020-0413-9)
